Subject: Ptrac
Object: Class responsible for loading and parsing PTRAC files (ASCII, Binary, HDF5). Entry point for reading histories and events with MCNPTools.

Subject: ReadHistories(NUM)
Object: Reads NUM histories from the PTRAC file (format-aware). Call ReadHistoriesLegacy(num). Returns a list of PtracHistory objects.

Subject: ReadHistoriesLegacy(NUM)
Object: Reads NUM histories using the legacy parser (non-HDF5 formats). Call ReadHistory()

Subject: ReadHistory()
Object: Reads the next history in the file. Fill all the attributes of PtracEvent, PtracNPS and PtracHistory classes. returns a PtracHistory object.

Subject: ReadHeader()
Object: Reads and parses the PTRAC file header (format-dependent), including version, code info, and comment lines.

Subject: Ptrac::m_handle
Object: File stream handle for reading PTRAC file content.

Subject: Ptrac::m_format
Object: Format of the PTRAC file (ASCII, Binary, HDF5).

Subject: Ptrac::m_nument
Object: Map of keyword to number of entries for each data section.

Subject: Ptrac::m_datent
Object: Map of data section name to vector of entry values.
